head.title: Baked Sweet Potatoes with Onions and Lime Butter

directions.step:
In small bowl place butter. Squeeze in juice of lime, and zest from rind . Mix well. Add salt and pepper to taste. Slice sweet potatoes, without breaking through the base of the potato. Place onions and pats of butter between potato slices. Wrap potatoes in foil and place on grill. Cook for about 15 minutes over medium to low fire. Serve. Recipe By : .FROM MY GARDEN SHOW #5531
